== Overview Microsoft Outlook allow the user to define macros written in Visual Basis to automate certain activities. To create a macro select Tools -> Macro -> Macros
image::create10.gif[]
Type in the name of your desired macro and press "Create".
image::create20.gif[]
You can now write your macro.
image::create30.gif[]
[source,text] ---- include::res/hello/HelloOutlook.txt[] ----
To run your macro, open Tools -> Macro -> Macros, select your macro and press Run.
